p: TS Oil was tested for the possible antimicrobial effect against both, the reference strains from the American Type Culture Collection (ATCC) and National Collection of Type Culture (NCTC) and clinical strains. These strains have role in respiratory diseases and include Klebsiella pneumoniae, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Staphylococcus aureus, and Candida albicans while the clinical pathogens include K. pneumoniae and methicillin-resistant S. aureus (MRSA). All the tested pathogen strains were routinely grown aerobically at 37Â°C.
